eureka_ml_insights.secret_management package

Submodules

eureka_ml_insights.secret_management.secret_key_utils module

This module provides functions for retrieving secrets from Azure Key Vault or a local JSON file cache. It includes functionality to look up secrets locally, fall back to Azure if necessary, and optionally cache new secrets in a local JSON file.

eureka_ml_insights.secret_management.secret_key_utils.get_cached_keys_dict(local_keys_path)

Retrieves the cached keys from a local JSON file.

Parameters:

local_keys_path (str) – The path to the local keys file.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the keys cached in the local file, or an empty dictionary if the file does not exist or cannot be decoded.

Return type:

Dict[str, str]

eureka_ml_insights.secret_management.secret_key_utils.get_key_from_azure(key_name, key_vault_url)

Retrieves a key from Azure Key Vault.

Parameters:

  • key_name (str) – The name of the key to retrieve.

  • key_vault_url (str) – The URL of the Azure Key Vault to retrieve the key from.

Returns:

The value of the key if found, otherwise None.

Return type:

Optional[str]

eureka_ml_insights.secret_management.secret_key_utils.get_key_from_local_file(key_name, local_keys_path)

Retrieves a key from a local file.

Parameters:

  • key_name (str) – The name of the key to retrieve.

  • local_keys_path (str) – The path to the local keys file.

Returns:

A tuple containing:

  • Optional[str]: The value of the key if found in the local file, otherwise None.

  • Dict[str, str]: A dictionary containing the keys cached in the local file.

Return type:

tuple[Optional[str], Dict[str, str]]

eureka_ml_insights.secret_management.secret_key_utils.get_secret(key_name, local_keys_path=None, key_vault_url=None)

Retrieves a key from Azure Key Vault or a local file cache.

Parameters:

  • key_name (str) – The name of the key to retrieve.

  • local_keys_path (Optional[str], optional) – The path to the keys file where the key is cached or should be cached by this method.

  • key_vault_url (Optional[str], optional) – The URL of the key vault to retrieve the key from if not found in the local keys file.

Returns:

The value of the key if found, otherwise None.

Return type:

Optional[str]
